long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension for the web app (@see: https://super-productivity.com/. It is required to allow the web app to access Jira issues and to handle a users idle state in order to let them handle time tracking for those periods.
